timeline.bodyText: What does O({@code max} - {@code min}) time mean?
timeline.author: YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5,6 +5,14 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_2758 net/minecraft/state/property/IntProperty ARG 2 min ARG 3 max METHOD method_11867 of (Ljava/lang/String;II)Lnet/minecraft/class_2758; + COMMENT Creates an integer property. + COMMENT + COMMENT

{@code min} must be non-negative and {@code max} must be greater than {@code min}. + COMMENT + COMMENT

Note that this method takes O({@code max} - {@code min}) time as it computes all possible values during instantiation.

replies.bodyText:
It states that the time complexity of the method is up to linear in the distance between min and max.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_complexity
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_O_notation
replies.author: enbrain
